item.title: InstagramのTwitter対抗馬Threadsは、App Storeの予約リストによると、2023年7月6日にiOSでローンチされる見込みだ（Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Instagram's Twitter competitor Threads is expected to launch on iOS on July 6, 2023 according to a pre-order listing in the App Store  —  Instagram's rumored Twitter competitor just dropped on the iOS App Store in the U.S. The app will be called Threads, and according to App Store data, it's expected to launch on July 6.

item.title: Twitter、30日以内にTweetDeckにアクセスするには認証が必要だと発表、TweetDeckのアップデートでコンポーザーのフル機能、Spacesなどをサポート (@twittersupport)
item.description:
@twittersupport:
Twitter says in 30 days users must be Verified to access TweetDeck, as it updates TweetDeck with support for full composer functionality, Spaces, and more  —  We have just launched a new, improved version of TweetDeck. All users can continue to access their saved searches & workflows via https://tweetdeck.twitter.com/ by selecting “Try the new TweetDeck” in the bottom left menu. Some notes on getting started and the future of the product... https://twitter.com/...

item.title: Twitterの従業員は、レガシーAPIのサポートを削除したことがTweetDeckを破たんさせ、同社はユーザーを「新」バージョンのTweetDeckに移行させると述べている（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Twitter employees say that removing support for legacy APIs is what broke TweetDeck, and the company will be moving users to the “new” version of TweetDeck  —  Twitter is officially launching its “new” version of TweetDeck to everyone, according to a tweet from Twitter's support account …

item.title: InstagramのTwitterライクな "テキストベースの会話アプリ "Threadsが、欧州の一部の国でGoogle Playストアに登場（Insider）
item.description:
Insider:
Instagram's Twitter-like “text-based conversation app” Threads is showing up in the Google Play store in some European countries  —  - Instagram appears to be getting ready to launch its Twitter-rival app called “Threads.”  — The app has been in development since Jan …

item.title: Ampere：Disney+Hotstarは、IPLクリケットの放映権を失ったものの、第1四半期の加入者数～5,000万人、シェア29%で、Prime Videoの1,240万人に対し、インドのストリーミングのリーダーであり続けている（Jesse Whittock/Deadline）。
item.description:
Jesse Whittock / Deadline:
Ampere: Disney+ Hotstar remains India's streaming leader with ~50M subscribers in Q1 and a 29% share, despite losing IPL cricket rights, vs. Prime Video's 12.4M  —  Disney+ Hotstar lost the rights to offer Indian Premier League (IPL) cricket last year, but the streamer remains India's market leader, according to Ampere Analysis.

item.title: イーロン・マスクの新たな閲覧制限後、TweetDeckユーザーから通知やカラム全体の読み込み失敗など大きな問題が報告される。
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
TweetDeck users report major problems, including notifications and entire columns failing to load, after Elon Musk's new read limits; home timelines still load  —  Over the weekend, Elon Musk limited the number of tweets users can read in a day, which he said was to prevent data scraping.

item.title: 情報筋Netflixは、「エピソード型」キャンペーンのような、ターゲットを絞ったオーダーメイドの広告フォーマットの開発を計画しており、カンヌライオンズで広告幹部とその戦略について話し合った（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Sources: Netflix plans to develop targeted and tailor-made ad formats, like “episodic” campaigns, and discussed the strategy with ad executives at Cannes Lions  —  US streaming service introduced ad-supported subscriptions last year  —  Netflix will develop increasingly targeted …

item.title: NetflixがHBOの『Insecure』のストリーミングを開始し、『Band of Brothers』、『The Pacific』、『Ballers』といった他の番組もWBD契約の一環としてサービスに登場すると発表（Peter White/Deadline）
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
Netflix starts streaming HBO's Insecure and says other shows, like Band of Brothers, The Pacific, and Ballers, will come to its service as part of its WBD deal  —  The HBO comedy drama launched on the streamer service earlier today, after Deadline revealed the surprising move last month.

item.title: ロンドンの無料ビジネス紙「City AM」が売りに出される。オンラインの月間読者数は180万～200万人、紙媒体の発行部数は6万7714部とのこと（Thomas Seal/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Seal / Bloomberg:
City AM, a free London business newspaper, puts itself up for sale, and says it has a monthly online readership of 1.8M to 2M and a print circulation of 67,714  —  City AM, a free business-focused newspaper in London, is seeking a buyer as part of fundraising discussions, it announced Monday.

item.title: 米玩具大手がIP活用のために設立したマテル・フィルムズは、ハズブロが同様の動きを見せた後、バービーを皮切りに45本の映画を開発中である（アレックス・バラーシュ／ニューヨーカー誌）。
item.description:
Alex Barasch / New Yorker:
A look at Mattel Films, formed by the US toy giant to leverage its IP and which has 45 movies in development, starting with Barbie, after Hasbro's similar moves  —  In an era when “pre-awareness” rules Hollywood, the company is ginning up plots for everything from Hot Wheels to UNO.

item.title: ITN、ケイト・フィッツシモンズの後任として、チャンネル4のニュース・時事担当編集長デビー・ラムゼイを5ニュースの新編集長に任命（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
ITN appoints Debbie Ramsay, Channel 4's commissioning editor for news and current affairs, as the new editor of 5 News, succeeding Cait Fitzsimons  —  Ramsay will take over the programme in the autumn.  —  ITN has appointed Debbie Ramsay as the new editor of 5 News, succeeding Cait Fitzsimons.

item.title: ByteDanceの書籍出版プッシュと不均等な土俵の懸念について情報筋が詳述；BookScan：BookScan：#BookTokのフォロワーが多い100人以上の著者の2022年の売上は7億6000万ドル（ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources detail ByteDance's book publishing push and uneven playing field concerns; BookScan: 100+ authors with large #BookTok followings had $760M in 2022 sales  —  As ByteDance launches a publishing company, many in the book world wonder if it will create an uneven playing field by boosting its own authors at the expense of others.

item.title: DirecTVは、ABC、CBS、Fox、NBCを含むNexstar傘下の159局を削除。
item.description:
Meg James / Los Angeles Times:
DirecTV removes 159 Nexstar-owned stations, including ABC, CBS, Fox, and NBC, after the two companies didn't sign a new distribution deal by the July 2 deadline  —  Millions of DirecTV customers lost access to Nexstar Media Group channels after the two companies failed to agree to a new distribution contract by a Sunday night deadline.

item.title: Ofcom、政治家がニュースキャスターを務めることへの苦情を受け、GBニュースとルパート・マードックのTalkTVの放送基準調査を開始（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Ofcom launches broadcast standards investigations into GB News and Rupert Murdoch's TalkTV after receiving complaints about politicians serving as newsreaders  —  U.K. media regulator Ofcom has launched broadcast standards investigations into TalkTV, owned by media mogul Rupert Murdoch, and GB News after receiving complaints.

item.title: ポインター研究所のMediaWise所長、ツイッターのコミュニティ・ノートは「真実に関するイデオロギーを超えた合意」を必要とするため、誤報との戦いにほとんど失敗していると語る（Madison Czopek/Poynter）
item.description:
Madison Czopek / Poynter:
Poynter Institute's MediaWise director says Twitter's Community Notes mostly fails to fight misinformation by requiring a “cross-ideological agreement on truth”  —  An attempt to solve ‘the problem of biased fact-checkers’ has left most Notes unseen by public, fact-checking conference is told
